Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Milan, Hotel Mennini is minutes from Pirelli Tower and Grattacielo Pirelli. This family-friendly hotel is within close proximity of Piazza della Repubblica and Indro Montanelli Public Gardens.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 62 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature bidets and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a health club, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the area shuttle (surcharge).

Dining
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Planning an event in Milan? This hotel has facilities measuring 431 square feet (40 square meters), including a meeting room. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request).


Check-in time starts at 10 AM Check-out time is noon
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours).
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Located in Milan, Hotel Mennini is minutes from Pirelli Tower and Grattacielo Pirelli. This family-friendly hotel is within close proximity of Piazza della Repubblica and Indro Montanelli Public Gardens.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Pirelli Tower - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Grattacielo Pirelli - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Piazza della Repubblica - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Indro Montanelli Public Gardens - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Casa-Museo Boschi Di Stefano - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Spazio Oberdan - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Porta Venezia - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Porta Nuova - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Planetario di Milano - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Museo del Cinema - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Galleria Cardi and Company - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Contemporary Arts Pavillion - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Villa Reale - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Modern Art Gallery - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Padiglione d'Arte Contemporanea - 1 km / 0.6 mi

The nearest airports are:
Milan (LIN-Linate) - 6.4 km / 3.9 mi
Milan (MXP-Malpensa Intl.) - 41.5 km / 25.8 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Mennini is Milan (MXP-Malpensa Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
